sqlMap.select: SELECT PACK_ID , CHNL_GRP_ID , CHNL_NM , APPLYDATE_GB , APPLYDATE , APPLY_YN , VERSION , CREATED , UPDATED , CREATE_ID , UPDATE_ID FROM PT_GP_CHNL_INFO WHERE PACK_ID = #pack_id#

SELECT GP.PACK_ID , GP.CHNL_GRP_ID , GP.CHNL_ID , CD.CHANNELNUMBER AS CHANNEL_NO , CD.CHNL_NAME AS CHNL_DETAIL_NM , GP.SERVICE_ID , GP.REPRESENT_CHNL_YN , GP.ORDERED , GP.USE_YN , GP.CREATED , GP.UPDATED , GP.CREATE_ID , GP.UPDATE_ID FROM PT_GP_CHNL_DETAIL_INFO GP , PT_CD_PLAY_CHNL CD WHERE GP.SERVICE_ID = CD.SERVICE_ID
AND GP.PACK_ID = #pack_id#
AND GP.CHNL_GRP_ID = #chnl_grp_id#
ORDER BY GP.ORDERED, GP.PACK_ID DESC, GP.CHNL_GRP_ID DESC, GP.CHNL_ID DESC

SELECT B.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM( SELECT D.CHANNELNUMBER AS CHANNEL_NO , D.CHNL_NAME AS CHANNEL_NAME , D.SERVICE_ID AS SERVICE_ID FROM PT_CD_CHNL_INFO C, PT_CD_PLAY_CHNL D WHERE C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND D.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND D.CHNL_NAME LIKE '%$srch_channel_name$%'
ORDER BY D.SERVICE_ID ) A ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN '$start_rnum$' AND '$end_rnum$'

SELECT COUNT(D.SERVICE_ID) FROM PT_CD_CHNL_INFO C, PT_CD_PLAY_CHNL D WHERE C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND D.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND D.CHNL_NAME LIKE '%$srch_channel_name$%'
ORDER BY D.SERVICE_ID
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_PT_GP_CHNL_INFO.NEXTVAL AS CHNL_GRP_ID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PT_GP_CHNL_INFO( PACK_ID , CHNL_GRP_ID , VERSION , CREATED , UPDATED , CREATE_ID , UPDATE_ID ) VALUES( #pack_id# , #chnl_grp_id# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '001' , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , #create_id# , #update_id# )

SELECT SEQ_PT_GP_CHNL_DETAIL_INFO.NEXTVAL AS CHNL_ID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PT_GP_CHNL_DETAIL_INFO( PACK_ID , CHNL_GRP_ID , CHNL_ID , CHNL_DETAIL_NM , SERVICE_ID , REPRESENT_CHNL_YN , ORDERED , CREATED , UPDATED , CREATE_ID , UPDATE_ID ) VALUES( #pack_id# , #chnl_grp_id# , #chnl_id# , #chnl_detail_nm# , #service_id# , 'N' , NVL((SELECT MAX(ORDERED) FROM PT_GP_CHNL_DETAIL_INFO WHERE PACK_ID = #pack_id# AND CHNL_GRP_ID = #chnl_grp_id#), 0)+1 , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , #create_id# , #update_id# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE PT_GP_CHNL_INFO SET VERSION = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(TO_NUMBER(CASE WHEN LENGTH(VERSION) < 9 THEN '0' ELSE SUBSTR(VERSION, 9, 3) END)+1, 3, '0'),
CHNL_NM = #chnl_nm#,
UPDATED = SYSDATE, UPDATE_ID = #update_id# WHERE PACK_ID = #pack_id# AND CHNL_GRP_ID = #chnl_grp_id#

UPDATE PT_GP_CHNL_DETAIL_INFO SET
REPRESENT_CHNL_YN = #represent_chnl_yn#,
ORDERED = #ordered#,
SERVICE_ID = #service_id#,
UPDATED = SYSDATE, UPDATE_ID = #update_id# WHERE 1 = 1
AND PACK_ID = #pack_id#
AND CHNL_GRP_ID = #chnl_grp_id#
AND CHNL_ID = #chnl_id#
AND REPRESENT_CHNL_YN = 'Y'
UPDATE PT_GP_CHNL_DETAIL_INFO SET ORDERED = #ordered#, UPDATED = SYSDATE, UPDATE_ID = #update_id# WHERE 1 = 1 AND PACK_ID = #pack_id# AND CHNL_GRP_ID = #chnl_grp_id# AND CHNL_ID = #chnl_id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PT_GP_CHNL_DETAIL_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND PACK_ID = #pack_id# AND CHNL_GRP_ID = #chnl_grp_id# AND CHNL_ID = #chnl_id#
